meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4022.

td.p: Andy Kravis, a freshman from Farmington Hills, Michigan
Liana Walters, a junior from Mechanicsburg, Pennsylvania
George Nelson, a senior from Montgomery, Alabama

tr.td: THE ANIMAL KINGDOM
CRAYOLA CRAYONS
CLASS ACTIONS
SPORTS HOME CITIES
(Alex: Current.)
THE CIVIL WAR
BODY LANGUAGE

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
